mapper.sql: id, name, common, icon, sort, parent_id, type, url, description, status, parent_ids, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by, del_flag, permission_str
mapper.update: update sys_resource set parent_ids = REPLACE(parent_ids, #{oldParentIds}, #{parentIds}) where parent_ids like CONCAT( '%,' , #{id} , ',%' )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_resource where FIND_IN_SET(#{id},parent_ids) or id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_role_resource where resource_id = #{resourceId}

SELECT DISTINCT res.id,res.url,res.type,res.parent_id, res.parent_ids,res.name,res.icon,res.sort FROM sys_resource res LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON res.id=srr.resource_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id=srr.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND res.del_flag=0 AND res.status=0 order by res.sort

SELECT DISTINCT res.id,res.url,res.type,res.parent_id, res.parent_ids,res.name,res.icon,res.sort FROM sys_resource res LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON res.id=srr.resource_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id=srr.role_id WHERE res.del_flag=0 AND res.status=0 and FIND_IN_SET(#{1},res.parent_ids) order by res.sort

SELECT DISTINCT res.id,res.url,res.type,res.parent_id, res.parent_ids,res.name,res.icon,res.sort FROM sys_resource res LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON res.id=srr.resource_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id=srr.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{0} AND res.del_flag=0 AND res.status=0 and FIND_IN_SET(#{1},res.parent_ids) order by res.sort
SELECT * FROM sys_resource t where t.del_flag=0 AND t.status=0 and t.parent_id=#{parentId} order by t.sort

select sr.id,sr.description,sr.icon,sr.name,sr.sort,sr.common, sr.status,sr.type,sr.url,srp.name pname,srp.id pid from sys_resource sr left join sys_resource srp ON sr.parent_id=srp.id
sr.name like concat( '%' , #{name} , '%' )
FIND_IN_SET(#{id},sr.parent_ids) or sr.id = #{id}
ORDER BY sr.update_date desc
